title: Amazon’s cloud computing service experiences regional outage
description: Amazon Web Services outage affects websites.

title: Have questions on your digital life? Ask our tech friend Shira Ovide.
description: The Help Desk’s Shira Ovide will answer reader questions about the technology in their lives during a chat on Tuesday, June 13 at noon Eastern.

title: 5G was an overhyped technology bust. Let’s learn our lesson.
description: Phone companies and Apple promised that 5G would be an awesome improvement. Nope. How can we believe in promises now of technology that will change our lives?
